bulletPoints: Worked on the Routing Team and created human readable logs of routing events for the SRE team and other PayPal engineers.
Expanded project into its own web service, where people could search for routing events and see readable logs, routing steps, and a sequence diagram describing the routing.
Used bootstrap for the front-end and Golang and Gorilla-MUX for the routing/handlers.
Created an NPS survey bot using Python, Postgres, and sending messages through Twilio, for the company to receive feedback and find potential sales leads with a referral program.
Worked with a reporting team to pull transaction data from stripe and generate financial reports for the company and CEO.
Worked with the Tier-2 Support team handling support tickets.
Created a model of LIGOâ€™s seismograph using Arduino and neodymium magnets. Wrote code to control the electrical components and display seismographic activity in C++.
Worked on front end web development for a big data team within Dell using Bootstrap, HTML, and CSS.
